Text.val: 04.02.2013 SH SCR17678 I/O properties: Changed CharSet = UTF-8 back to Ansi
05.04.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)

SQL_STMT_U.val: select invo_admno,invo_clntno,debh_no,debh_hadr_name1,invo_invoiceno,invo_invdate,invo_duedate,invo_netdays, (days(curdate())-days(invo_duedate)),invo_ainitiali,invo_currency,invo_ainitialh,invo_aactualh from :1/invo,:1/debh,:1/debc as t1 where invo_admno=:2 and invo_clntno=:3 and days(':5')-days(invo_duedate)>=:4 and invo_aactuali<>0 and debh_no=invo_debh_no and invo_debc_no=debc_no and debc_creditlimit=0
